title: Ultimate Hat Removal Feedback
body:

{{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  

You wait a second there Riot.
This Rune is mandatory on Karthus and you're removing it and replacing it with something useless.
If Lux is the problem nerf Lux.

If you absolutely must remove it then give Karthus compensation on his ult. Sticking it in domination under the same tier as a rune he prefers more is all in all a direct nerf.
Don't let one champion ruin a rune used by other champions. Nerf the champion.

You have to have the precision CD rune and the damage amp to low hp targets.

As a Karthus main this is what you take right now:
https://i.imgur.com/myrqfXU.png[]
